contentfulProjects.title: Pendula Swing Episode 1 - Tired and Retired

detailedText.raw:
{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"A game by Valiant Games - Tolkien meets The Great Gatsby in this adventure set in a fantasy version of the American Roaring 1920s. Play as the famous hero Brialynne, forced to interrupt her retirement. You knew the world had changed, but not just how much. Cars, strange music, and now orcs and goblins roam the city peacefully?!","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"

In November 2018 our programming team ported Pendula Swing Episode 1 - Tired and Retired from PC to iOS. During our collaboration we worked on the following:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"iOS build-pipeline
Rendering pipeline crashes
Dissassembly debugging
